title: When Riot knows something about your mains lore
body:
but they don't have plans to reveal what it is for years.

 https://i1.wp.com/img.pandawhale.com/post-35369-Loki-TELL-ME-gif-Imgur-yg7d.gif

replies.body: He does, but they keep hinting other stuff that they will "get back to eventually". plus his new lore brought up new questions (like if he can actually make magic decoys or are they all straw decoys like the one in his lore).
True, personally, I still want Riot to expand on Poppy and Galio's friendship but it seems to only be "they're the only Demacians who are really freaking old".
There is another user of the windwall technique, so prepare your anus if they make him into a champ.
{{champion:92}} this is that other wind technique champion.

her ult secondary is a windslash, in game yasuo references that, also she is known to have interacted with ionia during the point where the second wind technique character should have been, and would have actively done things that coincide with the goals of the second wind technique character, plus it also creates a reasonable and interesting similarities between the two characters while creating room for a realistic crossroads meeting for the two.
